tasks.title: Set up Resend account and configure SMTP for Supabase Auth
tasks.description: Configure Resend as the SMTP provider for Supabase Auth to handle OTP emails reliably
tasks.details:
1. Create Resend account at resend.com
2. Verify sending domain (midwestea.com) in Resend dashboard
3. Generate Resend API key from dashboard
4. Navigate to Supabase Project Settings > Authentication > SMTP
5. Enable 'Custom SMTP' with settings:
   - SMTP Host: smtp.resend.com
   - SMTP Port: 465 (SSL/TLS)
   - SMTP Username: resend
   - SMTP Password: [Resend API Key]
   - Sender Email: noreply@midwestea.com
   - Sender Name: MidwestEA Support
6. Save configuration and test OTP delivery
7. Store RESEND_API_KEY in environment variables
8. Document configuration steps for future reference
tasks.testStrategy: Test OTP email delivery by triggering password reset or sign-up flow. Verify emails are delivered within 5 seconds and appear in Resend dashboard logs. Test with multiple email providers (Gmail, Outlook, etc.) to ensure deliverability.

subtasks.title: Create Resend account and verify domain
subtasks.description: Set up Resend account and verify the midwestea.com domain for email sending
subtasks.details:
1. Navigate to resend.com and create a new account
2. Complete account verification process
3. Access the Resend dashboard
4. Navigate to the Domains section
5. Add midwestea.com as a sending domain
6. Follow domain verification steps (add DNS records)
7. Wait for domain verification to complete
8. Confirm domain status shows as verified
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify domain appears as 'Verified' in Resend dashboard. Test DNS records are properly configured using dig or nslookup commands.

subtasks.title: Generate and secure Resend API key
subtasks.description: Create Resend API key and store it securely in environment variables
subtasks.details:
1. In Resend dashboard, navigate to API Keys section
2. Click 'Create API Key' button
3. Provide descriptive name (e.g., 'MidwestEA-Supabase-Auth')
4. Select appropriate permissions for sending emails
5. Copy the generated API key immediately
6. Add RESEND_API_KEY to environment variables (.env files)
7. Ensure API key is added to production environment variables
8. Test API key validity with a simple API call
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API key by making a test API call to Resend. Verify key is properly loaded from environment variables in both development and production environments.

subtasks.title: Configure Supabase SMTP settings
subtasks.description: Set up custom SMTP configuration in Supabase Auth using Resend credentials
subtasks.details:
1. Log into Supabase project dashboard
2. Navigate to Project Settings > Authentication
3. Scroll to SMTP Settings section
4. Enable 'Custom SMTP' option
5. Configure SMTP settings:
   - SMTP Host: smtp.resend.com
   - SMTP Port: 465
   - SMTP Username: resend
   - SMTP Password: [Resend API Key from environment]
   - Sender Email: noreply@midwestea.com
   - Sender Name: MidwestEA Support
6. Save configuration changes
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify SMTP settings are saved correctly in Supabase dashboard. Check that all fields display the correct values after saving.

subtasks.title: Test OTP email delivery functionality
subtasks.description: Verify that OTP emails are being sent successfully through the configured Resend SMTP
subtasks.details:
1. Trigger OTP email by initiating password reset flow
2. Test with multiple email addresses (Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo)
3. Verify emails are delivered within 5 seconds
4. Check email content and formatting
5. Confirm sender appears as 'MidwestEA Support <noreply@midwestea.com>'
6. Monitor Resend dashboard for delivery logs
7. Test OTP functionality by completing authentication flow
8. Verify emails don't land in spam folders
subtasks.testStrategy: Test OTP delivery with at least 3 different email providers. Measure delivery time and verify 100% delivery rate. Check Resend dashboard logs for successful sends and any bounce/complaint notifications.

tasks.description: Create logging infrastructure for email operations and implement monitoring for email delivery and system health
tasks.details:
1. Create email activity logging system:
   - Add email_logs table to Supabase:
     * id (UUID), timestamp, recipient_email, email_type, status, error_message, retry_count, enrollment_id, student_id
   - Implement logEmailActivity() function in email.ts
   - Log all email operations: OTP, enrollment confirmations, email account creation
2. Add monitoring and alerting:
   - Track email delivery rates and response times
   - Monitor Resend API usage and rate limits
   - Alert on high failure rates or API errors
   - Dashboard for email metrics (optional)
3. Implement health check endpoints:
   - /api/health/email - test email sending capability
   - /api/health/resend - check Resend API connectivity
4. Add performance monitoring:
   - Track email sending duration
   - Monitor database query performance
   - Log webhook processing times
5. Create admin utilities:
   - Retry failed emails manually
   - View email logs and statistics
   - Test email templates with sample data
6. Add proper log rotation and cleanup for production
7. Implement structured logging with proper log levels
tasks.testStrategy: Test logging with various email scenarios and verify data accuracy. Test monitoring alerts with simulated failures. Verify health check endpoints return correct status. Performance testing to ensure logging doesn't impact email sending speed. Test log cleanup and rotation mechanisms.

subtasks.title: Create email activity logging database schema and functions
subtasks.description: Set up the email_logs table in Supabase and implement the logEmailActivity() function for tracking all email operations
subtasks.details: Add email_logs table to Supabase with fields: id (UUID), timestamp, recipient_email, email_type, status, error_message, retry_count, enrollment_id, student_id. Implement logEmailActivity() function in email.ts to log all email operations including OTP, enrollment confirmations, and email account creation attempts.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test logging function with various email scenarios and verify data is correctly stored in database. Test with different email types and status values.

subtasks.title: Implement monitoring and alerting for email delivery metrics
subtasks.description: Create monitoring system to track email delivery rates, response times, and Resend API usage with alerting capabilities
subtasks.details: Track email delivery rates and response times by analyzing logged data. Monitor Resend API usage and rate limits. Implement alerting system for high failure rates or API errors. Create functions to calculate delivery metrics and trigger alerts when thresholds are exceeded.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test monitoring with simulated email failures and verify alerts are triggered correctly. Test rate limit monitoring and API connectivity checks.

subtasks.title: Create health check endpoints for email system status
subtasks.description: Implement API endpoints to check email sending capability and Resend API connectivity for system health monitoring
subtasks.details: Create /api/health/email endpoint to test email sending capability by attempting to send a test email. Create /api/health/resend endpoint to check Resend API connectivity and authentication. Both endpoints should return proper HTTP status codes and detailed health information.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test health check endpoints return correct status codes and information. Verify endpoints work when services are healthy and when they fail.

subtasks.title: Add performance monitoring for email operations
subtasks.description: Implement performance tracking for email sending duration, database queries, and webhook processing times
subtasks.details: Track email sending duration by measuring time from initiation to completion. Monitor database query performance for email-related operations. Log webhook processing times for email delivery confirmations. Implement structured logging with proper log levels (info, warn, error) and performance metrics collection.
subtasks.testStrategy: Performance testing to ensure logging doesn't impact email sending speed. Verify timing measurements are accurate and performance data is properly logged.

subtasks.title: Create admin utilities and log management system
subtasks.description: Build admin tools for manual email retry, viewing logs and statistics, testing templates, and implementing log rotation
subtasks.details: Create admin utilities to retry failed emails manually, view email logs and delivery statistics, and test email templates with sample data. Implement proper log rotation and cleanup mechanisms for production environment. Add functionality to search and filter email logs by various criteria.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test admin utilities with various scenarios including failed emails and different log filters. Test log cleanup and rotation mechanisms to ensure they work correctly without data loss.
